cl:changeset.author: dpatrow
cl:changeset.cl:description: Add table for recording_migration_1 table which contains recordings that needed to be migrated first. This includes all favorite videos and videos that are created in the last 24 hours.

cl:changeset.author: dpatrow
cl:changeset.cl:description: Add table for recording_migration_2 table which contains recordings to be migrated after everything in recording_migration_1 is done.

cl:cql.cl:update: CREATE TABLE recording_migration_2 ( placeid uuid, recordingid timeuuid, created timestamp, modified timestamp, state text, type int, ttl bigint, PRIMARY KEY ((placeid), recordingid, type) ) WITH CLUSTERING ORDER BY (recordingid DESC, type DESC);

cl:changeset.author: dpatrow
cl:changeset.cl:description: Add table for recording_migration_3 table which contains streams to be migrated into the new purge table to be deleted.

cl:cql.cl:update: CREATE TABLE recording_migration_3 ( placeid uuid, recordingid timeuuid, created timestamp, modified timestamp, state text, type int, ttl bigint, PRIMARY KEY ((placeid), recordingid, type) ) WITH CLUSTERING ORDER BY (recordingid DESC, type DESC);
